name: Mars 2030
description: Board the U.S.S. Armstrong on the first one way mission to Mars. Direct four randomly generated crew on a deadly adventure in simulated real time across 195-million miles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit or better
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Video Memory or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit or better

reviews.review_text: I found it really funny and it's so eighties. Worth a try.
